text: Qua that, Allah chi cam cac nguoi giao hao voi nhung ke chong lai cac nguoi vi ton giao va truc xuat cac nguoi khoi nha cua cua cac nguoi cung nhu nhung ai tiep tay trong viec truc xuat cac nguoi đe lam đong minh cua chung. Va bat cu ai lam đong minh cua chung thi đo la nhung ke lam đieu sai quay
